name: The Broken Hearts Club: A Romantic Comedy
Personal Services
tagline: The story of the rise of a madame of a suburban brothel catering to older men, inspired by the real experiences of Cynthia Payne.

name: Carman: The Champion
tagline: Carman must enter the boxing ring once again. Even though the doctor has advised him against it, he picks up his gloves for one last fight, for his father, for his church, for his love, and for his life.

name: The Story of the Weeping Camel

production.name: Hochschule für Fernsehen und Film München (HFF)

tagline: When a Mongolian nomadic family's newest camel colt is rejected by its mother, a musician is needed for a ritual to change her mind.

name: We Need to Talk About Kevin
tagline: Kevin's mother struggles to love her strange child, despite the increasingly vicious things he says and does as he grows up. But Kevin is just getting started, and his final act will be beyond anything anyone imagined.

name: Look at Me
tagline: A french girl gifted with a great voice, has a complex about her weight and her appearance.

name: Apollo 13
tagline: Three astronauts must devise a strategy to return to Earth safely after their spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage.

name: Little Nikita
tagline: An FBI agent works to uncover an All-American family as Soviet sleeper agents and gets caught up in friendship with their unaware son.

name: Che: Part One
tagline: In 1956, Ernesto 'Che' Guevara and a band of Castro-led Cuban exiles mobilize an army to topple the regime of dictator Fulgencio Batista.

name: The Rosary Murders
tagline: A priest is put in a dilemma when the serial killer who has been murdering priests and nuns confesses to him.

name: Take Shelter
tagline: Plagued by a series of apocalyptic visions, a young husband and father questions whether to shelter his family from a coming storm, or from himself.

name: Pokémon 4: The Movie
tagline: Ash must stop a hunter who forces the legendary Pokémon Celebi to help him destroy a forest.

name: Every Little Step
tagline: Follows the plight of real-life dancers as they struggle through auditions for the Broadway revival of "A Chorus Line". Also investigates the history of the show and the creative minds behind the original and current incarnations.

name: Link
tagline: A zoology student must try to out smart a murderous and super-intelligent orangutan.

name: Vertigo
tagline: A retired San Francisco detective suffering from acrophobia investigates the strange activities of an old friend's wife, all the while becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

name: The Attack
tagline: An Arab surgeon living in Tel Aviv discovers a dark secret about his wife in the aftermath of a suicide bombing.

name: Sweet Land
tagline: In 1920, Inge, a German national, travels from Norway to rural Minnesota for her arranged marriage to Olaf, a Norwegian farmer; bureaucracy and prejudice cause major complications.

name: Everything Is Illuminated
tagline: A young Jewish American man endeavors to find the woman who saved his grandfather during World War II in a Ukrainian village, that was ultimately razed by the Nazis, with the help of an eccentric local.

name: The Life and Times of Hank Greenberg
tagline: The life and career of Hank Greenberg, the first major Jewish baseball star in the Major Leagues.

name: Death Wish V: The Face of Death
tagline: Paul Kersey is back at working vigilante justice when when his fiancée, Olivia, has her business threatened by mobsters.

name: Stoker
tagline: After India's father dies, her Uncle Charlie, who she never knew existed, comes to live with her and her unstable mother. She comes to suspect this mysterious, charming man has ulterior motives and becomes increasingly infatuated with him.

name: When Time Ran Out...
tagline: An active volcano threatens a south Pacific island resort and its guests as a power struggle ensues between the property's developer and a drilling foreman.

name: Best of the Best
tagline: A team from the United States is going to compete against Korea in a Tae Kwon Do tournament. The team consists of fighters from all over the country--can they overcome their rivalry and work together to win?

name: The Bad Lieutenant: Port of Call - New Orleans
tagline: Terence McDonagh is a drug- and gambling-addled detective in post-Katrina New Orleans investigating the killing of five Senegalese immigrants.

name: Unfinished Song
tagline: Grumpy pensioner Arthur honors his recently deceased wife's passion for performing by joining the unconventional local choir to which she used to belong, a process that helps him build bridges with his estranged son, James.

name: Suicide Kings
tagline: A group of youngsters kidnap a respected Mafia figure.

name: Blood Simple.
tagline: A rich but jealous man hires a private investigator to kill his cheating wife and her new man. But, when blood is involved, nothing is simple.

name: Quinceañera
tagline: As Magdalena's 15th birthday approaches, her simple, blissful life is complicated by the discovery that she's pregnant. Kicked out of her house, she finds a new family with her great-granduncle and gay cousin.

name: El vacilón: The Movie
tagline: The adventures and misadventures of New York Spanish-language radio personalities Luis Jimenez and Moonshadow, from the morning program El Vacilón de la Mañana.

name: Tango
tagline: Mario Suarez is a forty-something tango artist, whose wife Laura has left him. He leaves his apartment and starts preparing a film about tango.

name: Matewan
tagline: A labor union organizer comes to an embattled mining community brutally and violently dominated and harassed by the mining company.

name: Who Killed the Electric Car?
tagline: A documentary that investigates the birth and death of the electric car, as well as the role of renewable energy and sustainable living in the future.

name: State Property 2
tagline: Three gangsters vie for control of the streets of Philadelphia.

name: English Vinglish
tagline: A quiet, sweet tempered housewife endures small slights from her well-educated husband and daughter everyday because of her inability to speak and understand English.

name: Talento de barrio
tagline: A young drug dealer falls in love while facing disruption among the men in his gang, and being offered a career as a Reggaetón singer.

name: Un Coeur en Hiver
tagline: Beautiful violin virtuoso Camille has two obsessions: the music of Ravel, and a friend of her husband's who crafts violins. But his heart seems to be as cold as her playing is passionate.

name: The White Countess
tagline: Set in 1930s Shanghai, where a blind American diplomat develops a curious relationship with a young Russian refugee who works odd -- and sometimes illicit -- jobs to support members of her dead husband's aristocratic family.

name: Out on a Limb
tagline: Matthew Broderick goes Out on a Limb in this surprising adventure about a financial whiz who takes a wild detour to come to the aid of his kid sister in the small logging town of Buzzsaw.

name: Factory Girl
tagline: Based on the rise and fall of socialite Edie Sedgwick, concentrating on her relationships with Andy Warhol and a folk singer.

name: The Celebration
tagline: At Helge's 60th birthday party, some unpleasant family truths are revealed.

name: Battle for Terra
tagline: A peaceful alien planet faces annihilation, as the homeless remainder of the human race sets its eyes on Terra. Mala, a rebellious Terrian teenager, will do everything she can to stop it.

name: Marci X

production.name: Munich Film Partners New Century & Company (MFP) HAM Productions

tagline: A Jewish-American Princess is forced to take control of a hard-core hip-hop record label and tries to rein the one of the label's most controversial rappers.

name: Tim's Vermeer
tagline: Inventor Tim Jenison seeks to understand the painting techniques used by Dutch Master Johannes Vermeer.

name: Spider
tagline: A mentally disturbed man takes residence in a halfway house. His mind gradually slips back into the realm created by his illness, where he replays a key part of his childhood.

name: Summer Hours
tagline: Two brothers and a sister witness the disappearance of their childhood memories when they must relinquish the family belongings to ensure their deceased mother's succession.

name: Gun Shy
tagline: An undercover DEA agent brings down the Mafia.

name: Love Is All You Need
tagline: A hairdresser who has lost her hair to cancer finds out her husband is having an affair, travels to Italy for her daughter's wedding and meets a widower who still blames the world for the loss of his wife.

name: The Railway Man
tagline: A former British Army officer, who was tormented as a prisoner of war at a Japanese labor camp during World War II, discovers that the man responsible for much of his treatment is still alive and sets out to confront him.

name: Camp
tagline: After a series of Broadway flops, songwriter Bert Hanley (Dixon) goes to work at a musical camp for young performers. Inspired by the kids, he finds an opportunity to regain success by staging an altogether new production.

name: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
tagline: The truth behind the ascension of Milkha "The Flying Sikh" Singh who was scarred because of the India-Pakistan partition.

name: Keeping Mum
tagline: A pastor preoccupied with writing the perfect sermon fails to realize that his wife is having an affair and his children are up to no good.

name: I'm Not Scared
tagline: A young boy accidentally discovers a deep hole in the ground, where another boy is kept prisoner.

name: Senna
tagline: A documentary on Brazilian Formula One racing driver Ayrton Senna, who won the F1 world championship three times before his death at age 34.

name: It Might Get Loud
tagline: A documentary on the electric guitar from the point of view of three significant rock musicians: the Edge, Jimmy Page and Jack White.

name: Kites
tagline: A wounded man searches for his sweetheart in the Mexican desert while on the run from the police, bounty hunters, and others.

name: Cairo Time
tagline: A romantic drama about a brief, unexpected love affair that catches two people completely off-guard.

name: Jesus of Montreal
tagline: A group of actors put on an unorthodox, but acclaimed Passion Play which incites the opposition of the Catholic Church while the actors' lives themselves begin to mirror the Passion itself.

name: Standing in the Shadows of Motown
tagline: Documentary about the Funk Brothers, a group of Detroit musicians who backed up dozens of Motown artists.

name: Double Trouble
tagline: When singer Guy Lambert goes on tour in Europe, he is pursued by two beautiful women, bumbling jewel thieves, and a mysterious killer.

name: Stories We Tell
tagline: A film that excavates layers of myth and memory to find the elusive truth at the core of a family of storytellers.

name: Chasers
tagline: A hapless Navy grunt is assigned SP duty. The catch : he must escort a beautiful female prisoner on her way to prison for going UA. She in turn will try anything to escape.

name: The Quiet Earth
tagline: A man named Zac Hobson awakens to find himself alone in the world, and In a desperate attempt to search for other's he finds only two who have their own agenda .

name: Rhyme & Reason
tagline: A study in the world of hip-hop, done mostly with interviews, in order to see why it is as popular as it is today and what the future holds.

name: New York, I Love You
tagline: Several love stories set in one of the most loved cities of the world, New York.

name: Race 2
tagline: Ranvir treads through the world of the Indian mafia in Turkey as he looks to avenge the death of his lover and partner in crime.

name: Gomorrah
tagline: An inside look at Italy's modern crime families.
